chargeHist.descr: Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)
Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault)

result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J. O'Hare was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Repeated Sexual Assault of Same Child (At Least 3 Violations of 1st Degree Sexual Assault), a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.025(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: If defendant is revoked, there are 3 days credit for time served.

miscConds.notes: Paid out of bond.   There can be more restitution added for future counseling.

Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions.

Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request.  Defendant is to submit to sex offender assessment and counseling,
Defendant is to comply with the Sex Offender Registry Program as required.

The defendant shall have no contact with anyone under the age of 18 without prior approval of the agent  the defendant shall have no contact with the victim or her family of any kind, whether direct or indirect, including in person, in writing, by phone, by e-mail or other electronic means, through a third party or in any other way.

The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.
Defendant shall comply with DOC sex offender rules  of supervision

timeConds.notes: Defendant is to report immediately to the jail.  The first 6 months is to be served without huber, after the first 6 months huber is then granted.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea
